channel.title: Ip banning look fast!
channel.description: 2 NOOBS LAGGIN MY SERVER UP SPAMMNIG SAYING IM HACKINGH THIS SERVER HWO DO I IP BAN!

item.title: Ip banning look fast!
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Lol, putting a player’s username on the IP ban list does nothing whatsoever. Just check their characterfile, and see what their IP addresses are. Then add those to bannedips.txt or whatever it is in your source. Besides, people shouldn’t be able to “lag your server up” - That more then likely implies that it’s coded poorly.[br][size=1]Posted on: 13 January 2007, 03:42:33[/size][hr][quote=“iraklis123, post:2, topic:46842”]try ::ipban username if dat dont work go to data it should say ban ips just get der ips and put dem in der[br][size=1]Posted on: January 12, 2007, 10:40:10 AM[/size][hr]or u can allways mute dem dat helps[/quote]
L2spell or leave the forums.

Read full topic
